useCase.name: Make a phone call
useCase.description: As a caller, I want to make a phone call from a phone booth.

preconditions.precondition: The caller has added money to the phone booth.

useCase.trigger: The caller initiates the phone call.

mainSequence.step: The caller adds money to the phone booth.
The caller uses the phone booth.
The phone booth connects the call to the receiver.
The receiver hangs up the call after completion.
The phone booth removes the remaining money.
The phone booth returns any unused money to the caller.
